favourite.article: What number is this in the hymnal book?

I like this song not because of the lyrics or the music but I like it much more because the Triune God Himself wants to dispense all He's riches into our whole being so that He might occupy our mind, emotion and will.
Praise the Lord! Greetings from Mexico to all the churches in the entire world! keep letting the Lord filling you with all His love.
“O LORD JESUS”… “O LORD JESUS I NEED YOU”… “O LORD JESUS FILL ME.”
I want be filled with the Triune God more and more every time.This song help me to enjoy Christ.
Praise the Lord for this song. Truly, He fills us through drinking and eating...
MY. FAVORITE. SONG. Saints, we want to be filled to the brim!!!
God is so precious to us! Let us all be completely filled with Him!! Rejoice in the Lord!
This song makes me happy! But above all, the Triune God makes me happy! We used to sing this song when I was yet in the young people! But now, I can still sing this song and it still makes me happy!
Hallelujah! I want to be filled up, up, up! With the Triune God!
I love this song!!!!! -church in ontario
